hanzi-su-wiki:
銀

Значения

Серебро

Мнемоника

  • Металл 金, к которому обращены взоры 艮, о котором мечтают — серебро. В Китае использовалось чаще золота.

  • Серебро не так хорошо, как золото.

Варианты

银
purpleculture_pinyin:
yín
silver; silver-colored; relating to money or currency
серебро; серебристый; относящиеся к деньгам или валюте

heisig_chinese_memo: A sibling of gold, silver is also a metal.
koohiiStory1: Like gold, silver is a metal.
koohiiStory2: Not sure why Heisig find the right side so troublesome. My grandma´s hairpin (just before long (#1920)) is made of silver, the metal that best reflects sun light. I´m sure you can see the flash from her hair as she walks by on a sunny day. Note that the two elements (sun and hairpin) share not only a horizontal stroke, but also the left vertical one. Therefore a bit odd stroke order.
jp_example_words:
銀(ぎん): silver
銀行(ぎんこう): bank
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: At the root of gold, there is silver. Gold is basically just silver leveled up. That's why gold is first place, and silver is second. If you just scratch gold really good, you'll find that at its root, there's silver hidden just underneath.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine taking a gold coin and rubbing it with some soap and water. As you rub, you slowly see that it's really silver underneath. Huh!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you want to hunt for some silver for yourself, all you need is a guinea (ぎん) pig. Guinea pigs can smell silver, so get a couple and set them loose in the woods and they'll lead you straight to it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Guinea pigs are to silver as normal pigs are to truffles.
Ru_trainchinese:
yín: (сущ) серебро
yín: (графема) деньги, валюта; серебристый
Kanshudo_mnemonic: not as good (艮) as gold (金) is silver
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Like gold, silver is a metal.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Gold " and " Gen ", the original meaning is a chemical element that is white, soft in texture, malleable, conductive, and non-oxidized in the air. "Said Wen": "Platinum. From gold, the sound of Gen." "Shu ‧ Yu Gong": "Jue Gong, iron, silver, carving, stone, chime, bear, silk, fox, raccoon, weaving leather."

" Silver " can mean silver or silverware. "Han Shu·Ku Li Biography·Yang Pu": "With silver and yellow, hanging three groups, Kuaxiangli." Ancient Yan Shi's note: "Silver, silver seal."

" Silver " can also mean currency. Song Fangshao "Qingxi Kougui": "Besides Shenglu, Gouma, Civil Engineering, Prayer Temple, Armored Soldiers, Flower and Stone Miscellaneous Expenses, millions of silver silks from the Northwest two captives are paid every year.

" Silver " also refers to Lian E. "Dai Dai Li Ji‧ General Wei Wenzi": "Study is deep, strong is to break, the welcome and the welcome, the friend is handed down, the silver hand is like broken, it is the trip of Buddhism." Lu Bian's note: "Silver, Lian E also 。" One said, "Junjun", the meaning of discrimination. Kong Guangsen’s supplementary note: "Silver, it’s still very good. If it breaks, there are restrictions. Zixia makes friends, but those who can meet them, those who cannot refuse."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " gold " and " gen ", the original meaning is a chemical element that is white, soft in texture, malleable, conductive, and non-oxidized in the air.
humanum_full_description:
從「金」，「艮」聲，本義為白色、質地較軟、延展性大、具導電性、在空氣中不氧化的化學元素。《說文》：「白金也。从金，艮聲。」 《書‧禹貢》：「厥貢璆、鐵、銀、鏤、砮、磬，熊、羆、狐、貍、織皮。」

　　「銀」可表示銀質或銀飾器物。《漢書‧酷吏傳‧楊僕》：「懷銀黃，垂三組，夸鄉里。」顏師古注：「銀，銀印也。」

　　「銀」還可表示貨幣。宋方勺〈青溪寇軌〉：「且聲色、狗馬、土木、禱祠、甲兵、花石糜費之外，歲賂西北二虜銀絹以百萬計，皆吾東南赤子膏血也。」

　　「銀」也指廉鍔。《大戴禮記‧衛將軍文子》：「學以深，厲以斷，送迎必敬，上友下交，銀手如斷，是卜商之行也。」盧辯注：「銀，廉鍔也。」一說猶「齗齗」，分辨之意。」孔廣森補注：「銀，猶齗齗也。如斷，有限制也。子夏交友，可者與之，不可者拒之。」
humanum_short_description: 從「金」，「艮」聲，本義為白色、質地較軟、延展性大、具導電性、在空氣中不氧化的化學元素。

(Simplified: 银)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 艮 indicates the sound; 釒 (money) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 艮 [ gěn ] blunt; tough, chewy
①一種金屬元素，可以制貨幣和器皿、電子設備、感光材料、裝飾品等：銀子。銀盃。銀牌。
②舊時用銀鑄成塊的一種貨幣：銀幣。銀錠。銀洋。銀錢。銀圓(亦作“銀元”)。銀號(規模較大的錢莊)。銀行(háng)。銀票。
③像銀的顏色：銀白。銀髮。銀河(亦稱“天河”、“銀漢”)。銀樣鑞槍頭(喻表面還不錯，實際上不中用，好像顏色如銀子的錫鑞槍頭一樣)。
④古同“垠”，邊。
⑤姓氏。

從「 金 」，「 艮 」聲，本義為白色、質地較軟、延展性大、具導電性、在空氣中不氧化的化學元素。《說文》：「白金也。从金，艮聲。」 《書‧禹貢》：「厥貢璆、鐵、銀、鏤、砮、磬，熊、羆、狐、貍、織皮。」 「 銀 」可表示銀質或銀飾器物。《漢書‧酷吏傳‧楊僕》：「懷銀黃，垂三組，夸鄉里。」顏師古注：「銀，銀印也。」 「 銀 」還可表示貨幣。宋方勺〈青溪寇軌〉：「且聲色、狗馬、土木、禱祠、甲兵、花石糜費之外，歲賂西北二虜銀絹以百萬計，皆吾東南赤子膏血也。」 「 銀 」也指廉鍔。《大戴禮記‧衛將軍文子》：「學以深，厲以斷，送迎必敬，上友下交，銀手如斷，是卜商之行也。」盧辯注：「銀，廉鍔也。」一說猶「齗齗」，分辨之意。」孔廣森補注：「銀，猶齗齗也。如斷，有限制也。子夏交友，可者與之，不可者拒之。」
From the sound of " Gold" and " Gen", the original meaning is a chemical element that is white, soft in texture, malleable, conductive, and non-oxidized in the air. "Said Wen": "Platinum. From gold, the sound of Gen." "Shu ‧ Yu Gong": "Jue Gong, iron, silver, carving, stone, chime, bear, silk, fox, raccoon, weaving leather." " Silver" can mean silver or silverware. "Han Shu·Ku Li Biography·Yang Pu": "With silver and yellow, hanging three groups, Kuaxiangli." Ancient Yan Shi's note: "Silver, silver seal." " Silver" can also mean currency. Song Fangshao "Qingxi Kougui": "Besides Shenglu, Gouma, Civil Engineering, Prayer Temple, Armored Soldiers, Flower and Stone Miscellaneous Expenses, millions of silver silks from the Northwest two captives are paid every year. " Silver" also refers to Lian E. "Dai Dai Li Ji‧ General Wei Wenzi": "Study is deep, strong is to break, the welcome and the welcome, the friend is handed down, the silver hand is like broken, it is the trip of Buddhism." Lu Bian's note: "Silver, Lian E also 。" One said, "Junjun", the meaning of discrimination. Kong Guangsen’s supplementary note: "Silver, it’s still very good. If it breaks, there are restrictions. Zixia makes friends, but those who can meet them, those who cannot refuse."

銀字的基本解释

銀
yín
见“银”。

銀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yín］
［《廣韻》語巾切，平真，疑。］
“银1”的繁体字。
(1)金属元素，符号Ag。白色，质软，延展性很大，是热和电的良导体，在空气中不氧化。通称银子或白银。银的合金可以制造货币、日用器皿和装饰品。
(2)钱；货币。
(3)银质或银饰器物的省称。
(4)用银镌镂装饰器物。
(5)像银子的颜色。
(6)廉锷。《大戴礼记·卫将军文子》：“學以深，厲以斷，送迎必敬，上友下交，銀手如斷，是卜商之行也。”卢辩注：“銀，廉鍔也。”一说犹“齗齗”，分辨之意。孔广森补注：“銀，猶齗齗也。如斷，有限制也。子夏交友，可者與之，不可者拒之。”
(7)通“垠”。界限。
(8)姓。汉有银木，明有银镜。见《正字通》。

銀字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銀； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1303第25
【唐韻】語巾切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】魚巾切，?音誾。【說文】白金也。【爾雅·釋器】白金謂之銀。【前漢·食貨志】朱提銀，重八兩，爲一流，直一千五百八十，它銀一流直千。【註】朱提，縣名，出善銀。　又黃銀。【山海經·臯塗之山註】黃銀出蜀中，與金無異，但上石則色白。又【唐書·房?齡傳】賜?齡黃銀帶。　又【寶藏論】銀有十七種，天生牙出銀坑內石縫中，狀如亂絲，色紅者上，入火紫白，如草根者次之。銜黑石者最奇，生樂平鄱陽產鉛之山，一名龍牙，一名龍鬚。生銀出石?中，成片塊，大小不定，狀如硬錫。母砂銀生五溪丹砂穴中，色理赤光。黑鉛銀得子母之氣。此四種爲眞銀。有水銀、銀草、砂銀、曾靑銀、石綠銀、雄黃銀、雌黃銀、硫黃銀、膽礬銀、靈草銀，皆是以藥制成者。丹陽銀、銅銀、鐵銀、白錫銀，皆以藥點化者，皆假銀也。外國四種，新羅銀、波斯銀、林邑銀、雲南銀，?精好。　又水銀。【前漢·劉向傳】水銀爲江海。【桂海虞衡志】邕州丹砂盛處，椎鑿有水銀自然流出。　又烏銀。【本草綱目】?藏器曰

小篆楷体

字形对比：

暂无。

silver
Basic explanation of words
silver
yín
See "silver".
silver
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yín］
["Guangyun" is cut, plain and suspicious. ]
Traditional characters for "银1".
(1) Metal element, symbol Ag. It is white, soft, and highly ductile. It is a good conductor of heat and electricity and does not oxidize in the air. Commonly known as silver or silver. Silver alloys can be used to make currency, daily utensils and decorations.
(2) Money; currency.
(3) The provincial name of silver or silverware.
(4) Decorate the utensils with silver engraving.
(5) The color like silver.
(6) Lian E. "Dai Dai Li Ji · General Wei Wenzi": "Study deep, strong to break, we must respect each other, friends and friends, silver hands are like broken, it is also a trip for Buddhism." Lu Bian's note: "Yin, Lian E Also." One said, "Junjun", which means to distinguish. Kong Guangsen's supplementary note: "Silver, it's still jubilant. If it is broken, there are restrictions. Zixia makes friends, but those who can meet them, those who can't refuse."
(7) Through "Yin". limit.
(8) Last name. There are silver wood in the Han Dynasty and silver mirrors. See "Zhengzitong".
silver
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 Silver; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1303 No. 25
[Tang Yun] Yu towel cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Fish towel cut,? [Said the text] Platinum also. 【Erya·Release Device】Platinum is called silver. [Previous Han·Shihuo Zhi] Zhu Tiyin, weighs eight taels, is first-rate, straight 1,580, and it is first-class silver. [Note] Zhu Ti, the name of the county, from Shan Yin.　Yellow again. [Shanhaijing·Gaotuzhishan Note] Yellow silver comes out of Shu, and is no different from gold, but the upper stone is white. Also【Tang Shu·Fang·Ling Biography】giving a yellow and silver belt to the age.　[Treasure Theory] There are seventeen kinds of silver. The natural teeth appear in the crevices of the stones in the silver pit. He who holds the black stone is the most curious. He lives in the lead-producing mountain of Poyang, with one dragon tooth and one dragon beard. Raw silver emerges from the stone, in pieces, varying in size, and shaped like hard tin. The mother sand silver is born in the Wuxi Dansha acupoint, and the color is red. Black lead and silver are like a son and a mother. These four are silver. There are mercury, silver grass, sand silver, Zeng Qian silver, stone green silver, realgar silver, orpiment silver, sulphur silver, gallbladder silver, and lingcao silver, all of which are made of medicine. Danyang silver, copper silver, iron silver, and white tin silver, all of which are enlightened with medicine, are all fake silver. There are four types of foreign countries: Shilla silver, Persian silver, Linyi silver, Yunnan silver, and good quality.　 Again mercury. 【Previous Han·Liu Xiangzhuan】Mercury is Jianghai. [Guihai Yu Hengzhi] At the place where Yongzhou Dansha is full, mercury naturally flows out from the vertebral chisel.　 and black silver. [Compendium of Materia Medica]? Tibetan vessels say

yín
вм. 银

銀

Значения

Серебро

Мнемоника

  • Металл 金, к которому обращены взоры 艮, о котором мечтают — серебро. В Китае использовалось чаще золота.

  • Серебро не так хорошо, как золото.

Варианты

银

Radicals: 金, 艮  (gold, root)
Meaning Mnemonic
At the root of gold, there is silver. Gold is basically just silver leveled up. That's why gold is first place, and silver is second. If you just scratch gold really good, you'll find that at its root, there's silver hidden just underneath.
Imagine taking a gold coin and rubbing it with some soap and water. As you rub, you slowly see that it's really silver underneath. Huh!
Reading Mnemonic
If you want to hunt for some silver for yourself, all you need is a guinea (ぎん) pig. Guinea pigs can smell silver, so get a couple and set them loose in the woods and they'll lead you straight to it.
Guinea pigs are to silver as normal pigs are to truffles.

艮 (северо-восток), 金 (золото)
